HediffDef.label: berserker rage
HediffDef.description: Orsimer are able to enter an enraged state during moments of extreme danger, often caused by intense pain. This state fortifies movement speed and melee damage, and greatly reduces pain. Though it also fogs the mind, draining sight and hearing.\n\nOrsimer are left fatigued after the rage wears off, decreasing blood filtration, blood pumping and metabolism. They can not enter an enraged state while they are fatigued, which will last 11 hours.
HediffDef.descriptionShort: Orsimer are able to enter an enraged state during moments of extreme danger, often caused by intense pain. Afterwards they are left fatigued, preventing them from enraging again until their body recovers.
